channel.title: Portfolio on CEO Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on CEO Playbook

item.title: Voltai
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An AboitizPower-backed venture launching the Philippines’ first large-scale battery-swapping ecosystem dedicated to B2B electric vehicle fleets.

item.title: Solviva
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An AboitizPower-backed venture removing the high upfront costs of solar adoption through an innovative ‘Rent-to-Own’ financing model for Filipino homeowners and MSMEs.

item.title: Artifract
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ first tokenized NFT platform backed by UBX and Unit 256 Ventures, which utilizes ‘Token Factory’ technology to fractionalize real-world assets like fine art and collectibles.

item.title: Consensys
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The market-leading blockchain technology company founded by Ethereum co-founder Joe Lubin, responsible for the critical infrastructure (MetaMask, Infura, Linea) powering the decentralized web.

item.title: Cardano
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Partnership between UBX and the Cardano Foundation, marking the launch of the first public stake pool in the Philippines operated by a regulated financial institution.

item.title: Dragonpay
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ leading alternative payment gateway that pioneered the aggregation of over 50,000 physical and digital payment channels, bridging the gap between the unbanked population and e-commerce.

item.title: Biddit
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: UBX-backed PropTech platform that transforms real estate investing by allowing users to bid for, purchase, and co-own vetted properties with accessible entry points.

item.title: Bux
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The UBX-backed payment gateway that boasts the country’s widest network of digital and over 50,000 over-the-counter payment touchpoints, bridging the gap between even cash-based consumers and the digital economy.

item.title: Seekcap
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The UBX-backed lending marketplace that has processed tens of billions in credit applications, closing the financing gap for over 65,000 MSMEs through same-day digital approvals.

item.title: Sentro
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: UBX-backed e-commerce platform that empowers over 30,000 Filipino merchants to build their own online stores for free, featuring integrated payments, logistics, and financing.

item.title: Klaytyn
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: One of the few financial institutions on the Klaytn (now Kaia) Global Governance Council, operating a consensus node to secure Asia’s leading enterprise blockchain.

item.title: ERPx
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A SaaS based, low cost ERP for tech’ing up micro and small businesses, Collecting transaction data for potential credit and digitizing payments.

item.title: i2i
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Leveraging a blockchain based automated clearing house and Peso denominated stablecoin, the i2i platform connects rural banks and MSMEs to the national financial grid.

item.title: Manulife Asset Management & Trust
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The first trust entity in the Philippines owned by an insurance company, offering direct access to global asset classes through innovative feeder funds.
